1.0.name: wordpress/post-subtitle
1.0.description:
Aesthetic, yet unconventional way of handling subtitles for posts.

Adds a text input field directly below the post title input field for a subtitle.

The subtitle can be used in your theme with the template tag the_subtitle.

ATTENTION: This plugin is updated with every version of Wordpress. Please ensure that you have installed the version of this plugin which corresponds with the version of Wordpress you are running. The "Versions Map" tab at the top of this page will tell you which versions of the plugin will work with which versions of Wordpress. This includes Wordpress MU users.

Idea from Chris Coyier
